SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.reports

Class SecurityCashaccountGroupByCurrencyBaseReport

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.reports.SecurityCashaccountGroupByCurrencyBaseReport
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccountPositionGroupSummaryReport
public class SecurityCashaccountGroupByCurrencyBaseReport extends Object
Base class for generating reports that group security positions and cash accounts by currency, with optional sub-grouping by security account. Provides core functionality for currency-based aggregation and exchange rate calculations used in portfolio reporting.

Supports two grouping strategies:

  • Simple Currency Grouping: Groups all security positions by their currency
  • Currency + Security Account Grouping: Groups positions by both currency and security account for portfolios with multiple accounts per currency

Key Features:

  • Automatic multi-currency conversion to main currency using appropriate exchange rates
  • Historical exchange rate support for past dates, current rates for recent dates
  • Trading day validation with fallback logic for non-trading days
  • Currency-specific decimal precision for accurate calculations

Exchange Rate Handling:

  • Main currency positions: rate of 1.0 (no conversion)
  • Current/future dates: latest available rate from currency pair data
  • Historical dates: end-of-day rates from specified date
  • Missing rates: fallback to latest rate if no trading days between target date and yesterday
  • Throws DataViolationException for missing rates on trading days

This base class is extended by specific report implementations. Subclasses call the grouping methods to obtain aggregated position summaries organized by currency. The class is thread-safe with lazy-loaded repository dependencies.

    • createAndCalcSubtotalsPerCurrency

      public Map<String,SecurityPositionCurrenyGroupSummary> createAndCalcSubtotalsPerCurrency(HistoryquoteJpaRepository historyquoteJpaRepository, List<SecurityPositionSummary> securityPositionSummaryList, DateTransactionCurrencypairMap dateCurrencyMap)
      Creates and calculates subtotals for security positions grouped by currency only. This is a convenience method that delegates to the more comprehensive grouping method.
      Parameters:
      historyquoteJpaRepository - repository for historical quote data
      securityPositionSummaryList - list of security positions to group and calculate
      dateCurrencyMap - currency and date mapping context for exchange rate calculations
      Returns:
      map of currency codes to their aggregated position summaries

    • createAndCalcSubtotalsPerCurrencyAndIdSecurityaccount

      public grafioschtrader.reports.CurrencySecurityaccountCurrenyResult createAndCalcSubtotalsPerCurrencyAndIdSecurityaccount(HistoryquoteJpaRepository historyquoteJpaRepository, List<SecurityPositionSummary> securityPositionSummaryList, DateTransactionCurrencypairMap dateCurrencyMap, Set<grafioschtrader.reports.SeperateSecurityaccountCurrency> seperateSecurityaccountCurrencySet, Map<String,Integer> currencyPrecisionMap)
      Creates and calculates subtotals for security positions grouped by currency and optionally by security account. This method performs currency conversion, loads necessary historical quotes, and aggregates positions according to the specified grouping criteria.
      Parameters:
      historyquoteJpaRepository - repository for historical quote data access
      securityPositionSummaryList - list of security positions to process and group
      dateCurrencyMap - currency and date mapping context containing exchange rate information
      seperateSecurityaccountCurrencySet - set defining which currency/account combinations should be grouped separately
      currencyPrecisionMap - map of currency codes to their decimal precision for calculations
      Returns:
      result object containing both currency-only and currency/account groupings
